We will be talking about splines and Generalized additive models (GAM). Please read chapter 7 in "An Introduction to Statistical Learning". We will mostly be focusinng on splines and the other non-linear transformations.

The tidymodels lab sections can be found [here](https://emilhvitfeldt.github.io/ISLR-tidymodels-labs/moving-beyond-linearity.html).
